extendedInfo.description: Lower price! - limited time only.Exclusively on Android, so make your iPhone friends jealous!If you're not satisfied, for any reason, within 30 days you get a full refund, period, no questions asked. We don't want your money if you're not amazingly happy.Details on how to get Pro version (living in China?): http://goo.gl/YGonRPlease Note: If you come across any problems please send us an email and we will resolve the issue as quickly as possible.  This is much better than simply leaving a comment because we can then ask follow-up questions.Pro version gives you:â Chinese handwriting recognition built in!â Mandarin audio - over 2,200 audio files of a real native Chinese speaker (stored on SD card 8MB)â Homescreen Widgets (two sizes available) - flip through your favorite words from your homescreenâ Multi-dictionary support - the superb ABC Chinese-English and ABC English-Chinese dictionaries (in-app purchases at extra cost)â Merged results across dictionaries - no need for cumbersome cycling through dictionariesâ Star English words (if you have the ABC English-Chinese dictionary installed)â Backup / Restore starred words, search history, preferences etcOther features:â Offline access to all features (unless specified)â Search Hanzi / Chinese, Pinyin or Englishâ Pinyin or Zhuyin (Bopomofo) pronunciation throughoutâ Both Simplified and Traditional Chinese characters supportedâ Coloring by tone - you can color hanzi, pinyin or zhuyinâ Simple, intuitive and powerful UIâ Live search - results update as-you-typeâ Progressive results - as you scroll down, progressively deeper searches are seamlessly performedâ Enter long Chinese text in the search box and get instant Pinyinization as well as automatic vocab listâ Starred Chinese words/phrases, Word lists, Search historyâ Custom search using wildcardsâ Clipboard support - copy Chinese from dictionaryâ Night mode (black background)â Quick Search Box supportâ Voice recognition (online only and only on supported devices)â Useful links to websites e.g. YellowBridge, Skritter, nciku, Google Translate (online only)â Uses CC-CEDICT dictionary data (stored on SD card) as the base dictionaryâ Seamless integration with our Hanping Chinese Camera app (for image-based character recognition): http://goo.gl/1clC8Hâ Supports Move to SD card*â No ads!* "Move to SD" conflicts with Widgets in that you can only have one or the other. Please read: http://goo.gl/Vc7HLzPlease Note:* Purchasing this app does not include the ABC dictionaries. For more details about these paid add-ons (which include the ABC Chinese-English Dictionary (200,000 Chinese headwords & 10,000 example sentences) and the ABC English-Chinese Dictionary (62,000 English headwords and 6,400 example sentences)), please read: http://embermitre.com/abc* For Chinese character input via pinyin, use Google Pinyin IME: http://goo.gl/WZ3Zop* If you are having problems downloading dictionary or audio data, please read this: http://goo.gl/Aj6r3* If many Chinese characters appear as empty square boxes, or if you would like to use a nicer Chinese font, read this: http://goo.gl/0P1wuMemory UsageInternal: 12MBExternal/SD card: 34MB + 48MB(ABC CE Dictionary) + 13MB(ABC EC Dictionary)Please use the forum (see below) to report any bugs or suggestions.Blog: http://embermitre.comForum: http://embermitre.com/hanpingTwitter: http://twitter.com/embermitre

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: My most used app, works perfectly. Never had performance issues even before i upgraded to a new phone. Well worth it for the pro version, the ABC dictionaries and the camera.  Keep doing what you\'re doing!
reviews.author: Edward Moon

reviews.title: Indispensable
reviews.comment: Best dictionary app here. Get the ABC dictionary and OCR (which works way better than any other I\'ve tried) if you\'re serious about learning Chinese.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: I use it all of the time while I\'m in Shanghai. All offline means I can use every feature without having to buy a Chinese SIM. When I take a picture of a menu to translate, it makes my iPhone friends jealous just like the description says :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best for English/Chinese lookup
reviews.comment: I had the free version and for such excellent software I decided to get the paid version although the free one is good enough for me.
reviews.author: Paul Chau

reviews.title: Use it all the time
reviews.comment: I\'m not sure I need the pro version but I used the free version so much I wanted to support the developer
reviews.author: Roger Han

reviews.title: Best Chinese dictionary
reviews.comment: I really like the new back up feature for my starred lists. Ohw! Keep up the great work.
reviews.author: Carl Fischer

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.comment: This app is fast and accurate. It was very helpful during my month of intensive Chinese lessons in Beijing, not only in the classroom but also just living in the city, communicating with Chinese friends,  etc. Buy it!
reviews.author: Kevin Thom

reviews.title: Best app for learning Chinese
reviews.comment: Great to learn chinese, can draw a character to know what it means. Works like a charm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why have I been downgraded to lite?
reviews.comment: I have pro installed which I paid for a few months ago.I found the app very user friendly and clearly the best app in its class.today however I want to use and find I have been downgraded to lite.how do I get back my pro account.I don\'t expect what service i pay for to disappear. Also I don\'t expect to have to go through the trouble to contact you to get my account reinstalled.I paid for this app. I am very disappointed.
reviews.author: See Liang Yung

reviews.comment: Very Good - my favorite Chinese dictionary app that I cannot live without!\tWell thought UI and good functionality. Happy to support development by paying little bit for the pro version of the application.  Suggestion: I wish the favorite words would be marked in the search result lists.   Update: Efficiency impact could be managed by making this configuration option. There could be two rounds in producing the search result list. One round to start generating and showing the search result, the second to mark the favorite words in the result list. If the result list were above some threshold length, the markings could be disabled.  Suggestion2: Typical use case for me: I switch between instant message application and Hanping dictionary. I use this app as a tool to help with translation. I just copy & paste the Chinese message and find it cut in pieces with translation for each word or simple phrase. For longer message this does not work any more conveniently though, because the distance between the pasted message and the fragments. If the original text could be read from the presentation of the fragments (which would then need to show numbers, punctuation, repetitions in some way etc), this use case would work very well. Configuration option again?
reviews.author: Frans Oilinki

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This app got be through chinese. They should add a \"use it in a sentence\" feature to clear up confusion with characters with similar meanings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My comment
reviews.comment: It is good. But the audio is not too good..
reviews.author: Joshua Aditya

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: As title says, it\'s friggin\' amazing! Best way to search for characters (just draw it on your device). Worth the money and then some. Thanks for making this!
reviews.author: S. Li

reviews.title: Truly brilliant
reviews.comment: By far the most useful tool I\'ve come across for learning Chinese. Absolutely brilliant. Solid, useful updates and a great developer. ABC additions are definitely worth it too if you\'re interested in Chinese. This was the first app I considered worth paying for (the only one for a good while). Excellent
reviews.author: Josh Nixon

reviews.title: Excellent Chinese Dictionary
reviews.comment: Latest update make this dictionary even better. Thank you very much for this great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Thanks for making it.
reviews.author: James Valdez

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: This is an excellent app it\'s very helpful.
reviews.author: Tracy Kelley

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Never fails, always working great.
reviews.author: Christopher Chua

reviews.title: Best Chinese dictionary
reviews.comment: The ABC add on isn\'t cheap, but if you\'re a serous student of Chinese well worth it.
reviews.author: Tom Liddell

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I was pleased by purchasing this software. Friendly interface, really convenient and cool  designe. It would be nice to have example texts to see how the word actually used in practice.
reviews.author: A Google User
